name: A Night at the Smithstolian
description:
Welcome to GUARD DUTY at the Smithstolian!

The Smithstolian is well known for its beautiful treasures and gemstones. Unfortunately, the Smithstolain is also well known for not paying its guards very well. That is why tonight, you are going to STEAL AS MANY JEWELS AS YOU CAN BEFORE YOUR SHIFT ENDS BY SNEAKING THE JEWELS OUTSIDE TO YOUR CAR. But, you don't want to get caught by one of your fellow guards, who may have the same idea as you. Therefore, you must STOP ANY OTHER GUARDS FROM STEALING THE JEWELS BY USING YOUR FLASHLIGHT.

Secret tips that you will only get on Itch.io:
JEWELS that are worth more are kept away from the front doors for safe keeping.
A JEWEL'S value increases the more attempts are made to steal it.
